article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11mlEzy hentry entry story-marquee-standard

h2.a: How The Chess Set Got Its Look And Feel

div.p: Prior to 1849, there was no such thing as a “normal chess set.” At least not like we think of it today.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z2CsHG hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Capturing The Bowels Of The Postal System Via A Hidden Camera

div.p: Ever wonder what happens to a package between the time you drop it off at the post office and it arrives, safely, at its final destination?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z1ZVcc hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: How The Cell Phone Was (Finally) Invented

div.p: The cell phone was the culmination of a good, old-fashioned race to invention, much like the one that led to the telephone itself. And it was spurred along not only by competition among R&D departments at rival corporations, but also by a broad sense of technological progress.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11ktRnF hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: 14 Words That Are Their Own Opposites

div.p: Here’s an ambiguous sentence for you: “Because of the agency’s oversight, the corporation’s behavior was sanctioned.”

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z91t32 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: This Hilarious Angelfire Page Apppears To Be Mark Zuckerberg's First Website

div.p: A funny thing happened on Hacker News today. Seemingly out of nowhere, someone posted a vintage-looking link and the eye-popping title: "Mark Zuckerberg's first website is still on Angelfire."

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14Faitn hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Infamous Cruise Ship Breaks Loose From Repair Berth

div.p: One person was missing Wednesday afternoon after high winds in Mobile, Alabama, caused the disabled cruise ship Carnival Triumph to break loose from its dock.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XY9Dfr hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: America's Most Intelligent City Is Not Where You Think It Is

div.p: The Intelligent Communities Forum has put this city in the top seven most intelligent cities in the world, and it is the only American city to make the cut.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-17cIagV hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The Perfect Day Contains Exactly 106 Minutes Of 'Intimate Relations'

div.p: Chances are, the ideal day doesn’t come close to the one you’re having.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11lA42G hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: A Brief Cultural History Of The Volkswagen Beetle

div.p: The story of the car and the advertising that made it an icon.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XY2A6i hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Top 5 Things We All Do That Can Kill Us

div.p: Do you feel safe as you go about your day? Well, you shouldn't. What you might not realize during your daily routine is that all the things that you do without really thinking about them are very possibly the exact things that are going to kill you.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-1065c53 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Four Reasons You Shouldn't Buy Bitcoins

div.p: I’m generally a Bitcoin fan, but in the interest of balance, here are four reasons you should think twice before buying Bitcoins.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10qsrGO hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: WILL APPLY THEIR OWN BLACK EYES

h2.a: UK Police Say Goths Can Be Hate Crime Victims

div.p: If you punch a punk in Manchester, it could be a hate crime.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YvHX56 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Will Gaming Addiction Become Official?

div.p: Experts hope the new DSM will recognize the increasingly common disorder.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-12BQqGz hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: ‘Mad Men’ Mapped: A Guide To The Show's NYC Hot Spots

div.p: Keens Steakhouse, Sing Sing Prison and the Empire State Building are just a few of the dozens of references made to 1960s New York in the AMC television series "Mad Men."

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Xe4nqL hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: IS YOUR CELL PHONE MAKING YOU STUPID?

h2.a: A Roundup Of All The Stupid Questions Asked About Cell Phones

div.p: Your cell phone is killing you, destroying your relationship, frying your baby’s brain, fueling war in Africa, and so on.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XYalct hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Obama To Return Part Of His Salary

div.p: President Obama plans to return 5 percent of his salary to the Treasury in solidarity with federal workers who are going to be furloughed as part of the budget cutting process known as sequester.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-17d3ToT hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Why It Only Seems Like Everybody Around You Is Having Sex

div.p: The virgin loser is a high school myth.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z8Hqsp hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: I Bought A Bitcoin (And You Can Too)

div.p: Yesterday, I did something entirely irrational – something both my common sense and my work as a business writer should have prevented me from even considering. I decided to buy a Bitcoin.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-1050jJs hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: ALL THEY WANT IS SOUTH KOREA

h2.a: The North Korea Deal That Wasn't

div.p: I heard Pyongyang make a real offer -- but the Obama White House didn't even listen.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10qDpfG hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: 34 Hyperrealistic Paintings You'll Swear Are Photographs

div.p: As you scroll through these 34 exquisite hyperrealistic paintings, something strange will happen. You'll start doubting your eyes, then your brain, then these images.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z8aPMx hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: NOW PUT YOUR TV BACK TOGETHER

h2.a: There Might Be A Cure For Meth Addiction

div.p: The Food and Drug Administration has fast-tracked human tests of what may be the first cure for methamphetamine addiction. The drug also may be the first non-opiate drug treatment for heroin and opiate addiction.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10yVxkW hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Disney Closes Game Publisher LucasArts

div.p: In some ways, the news is not a surprise. LucasArts had seemed directionless in recent years. The company's core business of games based on the Star Wars license have been largely disappointing in both quality and sales.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z6hf5z hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: America's First Marijuana Critic

div.p: William Breathes is the envy of every pot smoker in America—he reviews marijuana dispensaries in the Denver Westword for a living.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10yjwkf hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Why Did 28,000 Rivers In China Suddenly Disappear?

div.p: For years, China claimed to hold an estimated 50,000 rivers within its borders. Now, more than half of them have abruptly vanished.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10sRuIu hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: HARD TO FIGHT CRIME WITH CAMEL TOE

h2.a: Fully Dressed Redesigns Of Superheroines

div.p: A project by Michael Lee Lunsford – of Supernnormal Step webcomic fame – that sees some of our favourite women superheroes dressed in non-revealing costumes has been causing a splash on the internet .

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-12dJwUP hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The NRA's Useless Advice

div.p: Paging through the new National Rifle Association report on improving school security, I stopped short at a photograph illustrating how profoundly depressing that document really is.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XWpNWE hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The World's Highest Paid Software Engineers Work For These 25 Companies

div.p: The highest paying company isn't your typical Apple, Google, or Facebook either.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-14MscKU hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Reasons Not To Stretch

div.p: Strike and hold a pose, such as touching your toes, for 30 seconds or more, we were told, and you’ll be looser, stronger and injury-proof. Now, new studies are giving us reasons not to stretch.
